Definition at line 49 of file BaseWindow.cpp.

◆ FillWindow()

void tsa::BaseWindow::FillWindow ( )
protectedvirtual

Initialize the window with the correct values, given its actual size. This is a pure virtual function, which is redefined by each window class.

Reimplemented in tsa::TukeyWindow, tsa::KaiserWindow, tsa::Cs2HammingWindow, tsa::WelchWindow, tsa::TukeyHannWindow, tsa::Cs2HannWindow, tsa::BisquareWindow, and tsa::BartlettWindow.
